title: Transparent Tribe Targets Indian Govt With Weaponized Desktop Shortcuts via Phishing
description: The advanced persistent threat (APT) actor known as Transparent Tribe has been observed targeting both Windows and BOSS (Bharat Operating System Solutions) Linux systems with malicious Desktop shortcut files in attacks targeting Indian Government entities.
